This package provides powerful functions to help the Scrum Master be happier when using Jira, reducing the time of pain. Here's what it can do for you:

1. HUD Function: After installation, you'll be equipped with the best armor for the job, effectively doubling your combat power!

2. One-Click Sub-Task Creation: Instantly create and fill out sub tasks with all the necessary information.

3. Optimized Workload Calculation: Easily calculate stories and sub tasks.

4. Poker & Planning Together: Switching between browser tabs won't take a toll on your mouse button anymore!

#GoFreight Internal Tool
